name: Word Chef Puzzle Game
description:
Word Chef is an exciting word searching puzzle game.
Find all of the hidden word with the delicious word cookies at your kitchen oven. Simply swipe along the letter shaped cookies to form a word.
Enjoy the game and improve your vocabulary, concentration and spelling skills!

NOTES
• "Word Chef" contain ads like banner, interstitial and video ads.
• "Word Chef" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and in-game currency to buy hints alike.
